Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "[en] updated some format of code comment" (#962) at vuejs/vuex
Merged pull request "inject-loader 예약어 수정" (#964) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
actionsInjector 를 불러올 때 inject-loader의 inject 예약어는 더이상 지원하지 않는다고 하네요.
require('inject!./actions')   >>  require('inject-loader!./actions')
